extendedInfo.description: Breezy lets you print or fax any document, directly from your Android device. Breezy gives you three easy ways to print: 1) Search for one public printers in the Breezy Partner Network, using the âNearby Printersâ option. We have thousands of locations already, with thousands more coming soon. (Some network partners, such as FedEx Office locations, may charge a fee for printing.)2) Print for free to your own printers using the Breezy Connector software (available now for Windows PCs and coming soon to Mac). 3) Print to your companyâs printers (where available - your company must be a Breezy corporate customer).4) (Bonus!) Breezyâs also the only print app in the store that lets you send faxes too (requires purchase of Breezy Credits). Just enter the number and tell us whether you want a coverpage, and youâre all set. Customers call Breezy âawesomeâ, âa great appâ, and âa must-have for business travelersâ, and the the NYT called us a solution to the âmore and more annoyingâ problem of having to âmove off your phone and onto your computerâ to print. Breezy is made by a small team of passionate developers, and we welcome your feedback as we continue to improve the app. Thanks for your support!===========KNOWN ISSUES:- In-app purchases not working on Android Market 3.4.4- Unable to "Preview" plain text files opened with a Share intent from another application-Rotating the Print Summary screen repeatedly causes a memory leak and eventually crashes the app- When using On-Device Encryption, if attempting to send a document > 4MB the app will hang and must be force-stopped- Rotating the Print Website screen after a web page has loaded causes the web page to zoom in- If you navigate back to the map screen via the back key, the blue dot representing your location disappearsWe're working hard on all of them.  Stay tuned!

reviews.title: Useful product
reviews.comment: I find it useful. Well worth the download. Some things to note: Needs to work more seemlessly with other apps  You should be able to fax without funds  Love the cover page feature
reviews.author: Shada Joseph

reviews.title: Not free App, charging money
reviews.comment: Not a free app, asking money. Useless.
reviews.author: Sanjeev Sharma

reviews.title: Will not send a fax.
reviews.comment: The app does not work, and contacting their tech support is a waste of time. DO NOT PURCHASE!
reviews.author: Ron Clifton

reviews.comment: Started off working great, after updates it completely stop work
reviews.author: J Hayes

reviews.title: What\'s with the one star reviews?
reviews.comment: You\'re complaining about not getting what you paid for and \"customer service\" isn\'t responding to help and make you whole when the latest update has focused on more critical things such as printing awesomeness and making themselves a new logo? Sorry, but I just don\'t understand why you\'re complaining!
reviews.author: Matt Kies

reviews.title: Need Mac OS version!
reviews.comment: Quit saying coming soon! Also, fix 1 star issues! Folks don\'t want to pay for faxes and print pages that they\'re not getting! If you want me to keep this app, and others too, you better give us customers what we\'re paying for and not cheating us!
reviews.author: tj sepe

reviews.title: Can\'t fax
reviews.comment: I purchased credits, but I can\'t even fax the test page. I enter the fax number and hit \"fax\" but nothing happens.
reviews.author: Marshall Levin

reviews.title: Scam
reviews.comment: Paid for 10 faxes. Only sent out 5 and my balance is 0. I emailed customer support a week ago and still no response. Don\'t waste your money on this garbage.
reviews.author: Jason Lum

reviews.title: lost 2 bucks for nothing!
reviews.comment: Wanted fax to Ukraine purchased credits and only after purchase they say they don\'t send to Ukraine. \"Breezy supports the following countries: United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Japan, France, Germany, Argentina, Brazil, Israel, India, Portugal, Italy, Hong Kong, Puerto Rico, and Australia. \" they say this only after I lost money ,  Cheaters all around nowadays, bye bye 2 bucks + uninstall!
reviews.author: Hakan Ton

reviews.title: Was unable to fax word doc.
reviews.comment: Attemptex to fax a word doc and got processing failure with no details of the issue.
reviews.author: Brian Gosch

reviews.title: This game sucks
reviews.comment: Just can\'t get past the tenth level
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My daily app!!!!
reviews.comment: One of the best app in the market, must have!!!  Thank you
reviews.author: Majdi Al-Zenati

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work on Galaxy Note 10.1
reviews.comment: Sign on / Sign Up screen will not allow me to create a new account, can\'t get past the first screen.
reviews.author: Sam Jacobs

reviews.title: Not yet...
reviews.comment: Get rid of the cover page.
reviews.author: Larry Underhill

reviews.title: Better than Cloud Print but..
reviews.comment: Ok let me start by saying that I\'m using this mainly to print to fedex. This app is indeed better than HP eprint and CloudPrint but still it leaves a lot to be desired. First off, the UI is ugly and doesn\'t support the latest devices (i.e. DNA, One X+) that don\'t have a separate settings capacitive buttion. It shows a menu bar at the bottom so you loose screen size for no reason. Second and most important you cannot print multiple documents at one time!! Gee, as if that\'s some exotic need.. to print more than 1 documents at one go! Anyhow, also the in-app browser has no history and you have to start navigation all over everytime you print one thing! Everytime, you need to type the address or go to google go to your site, find the page and print. Then you need to start all over again! It took me 20 mins to print just 4 different documents.  Still it gets the job done so I\'m giving it 3 stars and not one. If they took a little more care of these little things they could dominate the market since google cloud print still doesn\'t have an official Google App and they could have a head start.
reviews.author: Anestis iliadis

reviews.title: Credits not posting
reviews.comment: I paid for the 10 credits for 1.99 and they have not posted. Then I was charged an extra 1.00 for no reason. I use to love this app. But now I try getting more credits it over charges me,and doesn\'t even give me the credits.
reviews.author: A Google User
